1.Extended Standards: Use addition and subtraction with one digit to solve one-step word problems

2.Extended Standards: Use addition and subtraction with at least one two digits to solve one-step word problems

3.Extended Standards: Use addition and subtraction within 100 with at least one  two digits to solve  at least two-step word problems.

4.Extended Standards: Use addition and subtraction with at least one three digit to solve one-step word problems

5.Extended Standards: Use addition and subtraction with at least one three digit to solve two-step word problems

6.Extended Standards: Use multiplication with two-digit and one digit to solve one-step word problems

7.Extended Standards: Use division with two-digit and one-digit to solve one-step word problems

8.Extended Standards: Use multiplication with at least one three-digit to solve one-step word problems

9.Extended Standards: Use division with at least one three-digit to solve one-step word problems

10.Extended Standards: Use  four operations with less than three-digit numbers to solve two-step word problems

11.Extended Standards: Use four operations with at least one three-digit numbers to solve at least two-step word problems.
